question: 1. Where the velocity of flow is maximum and pressure is minimum?:
2. When an orifice is called a large orifice?

answers.a: When head of liquid from the center of orifice is less than 5 times the depth of orifice
answers.b: When diameter of orifice is same as diameter of pipe
answers.c: When the orifice is placed near to the end of the pipe
